name: Healing Herb
description: A fragrant green herb with restorative properties. Can be consumed to restore a small amount of health.

name: Health Potion
description: A small glass vial filled with glowing red liquid. Restores a moderate amount of health when consumed.

name: Glowing Mushroom
description: A bioluminescent fungus that pulses with an eerie blue light. Consuming it restores a small amount of health but tastes terrible.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron blade, well-balanced and sharp. A reliable weapon for any adventurer.

name: Leather Armor
description: A set of hardened leather armor. Offers decent protection without sacrificing mobility.

name: Enchanted Blade
description: A sword that glows with a faint green light. Ancient runes are etched along the fuller. It feels alive in your hand.

name: Spider Silk Vest
description: Woven from the silk of giant forest spiders, this vest is surprisingly tough and lightweight.

name: Gold Ring
description: A simple gold ring, slightly tarnished. It might be worth something to the right buyer.

name: Pouch of Gold
description: A small leather pouch jingling with gold coins.

name: Pile of Gold
description: A generous handful of gold coins from the treasure hoard.

name: Torch
description: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. Useful for lighting dark places.

name: Old Map
description: A faded map of the Verdantia region showing villages, forests, mountains, and caves. Some locations are marked with warnings.

name: Greater Health Potion
description: A large flask of brilliant red liquid that swirls with golden motes. Restores a large amount of health.

name: Steel Sword
description: A finely crafted steel blade with a leather-wrapped grip. Superior to iron in every way.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Interlocking steel rings form a protective shirt. Heavy but effective against slashing attacks.

name: Wolf Pelt
description: A thick gray wolf pelt, still warm. Could be sold or perhaps used by a skilled craftsman.

name: Antidote
description: A small vial of green liquid that cures poison and restores a bit of health.
